name: Moon
description: The Moon is an astronomical body that orbits the Earth as its only natural satellite. It is the fifth-largest satellite in the Solar System.

name: Mars
description: Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun and the second-smallest planet in the Solar System, being larger than only Mercury.

name: Jupiter
description: Jupiter is the fifth planet from the Sun and the largest in the Solar System. It is a gas giant with a mass one-thousandth that of the Sun.
